org.kiji.schema.layout
Class CellSpec

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.layout.CellSpec

@ApiAudience.Framework
@ApiStability.Evolving
public final class CellSpec
extends Object

Specification of a column in a Kiji table.

Contains everything needed to encode or decode a given column. Wraps a CellSchema Avro record to avoid re-parsing JSON Avro schemas every time, and associates it with a schema table to resolve schema IDs or hashes.

A CellSpec is constructed from a KijiTableLayout and is intended for a consumption by KijiCellEncoder and KijiCellDecoder.

readAvroSchema

public static org.apache.avro.Schema readAvroSchema(CellSchema cellSchema)
                                             throws InvalidLayoutException
Reads the Avro schema from the table layout.

Parameters:
cellSchema - The portion of the table layout record to read from.
Returns:
the Avro schema if relevant, or null.
Throws:
InvalidLayoutException - if the specification or the schema is invalid.
SchemaClassNotFoundException - if the class for a specific Avro record is not found.

getSchemaFromClass

public static org.apache.avro.Schema getSchemaFromClass(String className)
                                                 throws InvalidLayoutException
Reports the Avro schema from a generated class.

Parameters:
className - Fully-qualified name of the generated class to report the schema of.
Returns:
Avro schema of the specified generated class.
Throws:
InvalidLayoutException - if the specified class does not correspond to a valid Avro type. In particular, throws SchemaClassNotFoundException if the class cannot be found.
